Title: I Survived Jessi's Bat Mitzvah
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Kelly Galuska
Actors: Kat Dennings, Fred Armisen, Neil Casey, Jessica Chaffin
Plot: Family blowups, secret liaisons and an unflattering dress make Jessi's bat mitzvah a night to remember.
